name: Bomber Chaos
description:
A fighter finds himself in the jungle with a bomb strapped to his body, he needs to collect pieces of other falling bombs in order to hold out time and survive as long as possible. Play together and survive as long as possible before the whole earth disappears from under your feet!

Bomber Chaos is a platformer where the player controls a character who cannot stand still for long, because when the timer expires, an explosion will occur. It is necessary to collect falling explosive barrels and replenish the timer.

Control:
WASD - walking for Player 1
Arrows - walking for Player 2

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Game for two
- Difficulty
